__e: So, what does a guy got to do to get a drink around here?

Yeah, what's a guy got to do

Whatever you do, do not offer to buy me another drink.
- The Imam. Invite him here for a drink tonight and try to loosen his tongue.
I bet I could get you to talk about it.
I don't normally do this, but I was watching you and can I buy you a drink?
